name: Nyx
title: Dimension Cleaver

uniqueWeapon.name: Dimensional Key, Magnus Fille
effect: Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 30%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 4%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 36%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 4.8%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 43%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 5.7%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 52%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 6.9%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 62%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 8.3%.
Auto Attack penetrates through enemies in a straight line and DMG is increased by 75%. Per each blade stack, DMG is increased by an extra 10%.

soulWeapon.advancement0: Summons the soul of Dimensional Key, Magnus Fille for 10 sec and immediately recovers 3 Mana. For the duration of the Skill, increases own Crit DMG by 150%.
soulWeapon.advancement1: Reduces Skill Activation Requirements to 50 time(s).
soulWeapon.advancement2: Increases the duration by 4 sec, and self becomes immune to CC for the duration of Skill.
soulWeapon.activation: Charges up upon dealing DMG 70 times.

skillInfo.name: Dimension Blade
skillInfo.description: Deals ??? P.DMG to target enemies and gains 1 stack of Blade per each hit enemy. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks. Blade can be stacked up to max 5 times, and lasts for 20 sec.

skills.light: When there are over 5 enemies, 20 sec cooldown is reset, and DMG is increased by 250%. Has a cooldown of 20 sec.
skills.dark: Max Blade stack is increased by 1.

uniqueTreasure.name: Dimensional Magical Circle
effect: [Dimension Blade] Increases the number of targets by 1, and for 10 sec, reduces the target's P.Block by 200.

skillInfo.name: Dimension Cleaver
skillInfo.description: Dispels all positive effects of target enemy and deals ??? P.DMG. Hit enemies take ??? P.DMG for 10 sec, and are knocked down for 3 sec. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.

skills.dark: Target receives 25% increased P.DMG for 10 sec.

skillInfo.name: Infinity Blades
skillInfo.description: Deals ??? P.DMG to frontal enemies in range, and the final attack deals ??? P.DMG to one enemy, inflicting knockdown for 3 sec. The number of target for the last attack increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.

skills.dark: When there are 5 blade stacks or more, DMG is increased by 70%.

skillInfo.description: Each auto attack fires an additional blade that deals ??? P.DMG. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.

skills.light: DMG is increased by 15% per each enemy on the field.
skills.dark: There is a 10% chance of dispelling enemy positive effects.

dark: When auto attacking, there is a 10% chance of stacking 1 stack of Blade. Nyx's ATK is boosted by 10% per each Blade Stack he holds.

profile.dislikes: People who do not listen to others

background.story: A mysterious dimension-crossing wizard with distinctly recognizable heterochromia. The perpetual smile on his face seems to come from the wisdom of someone who sees through the entire universe. He shows great interest in those with special abilities and enjoys testing them. His space teleportation ability seems to surpass the realm of mortals, and he can even travel across dimensions. It is unsure what his true motivation is, but it seems certain enough that he always intends to help others.

itemIntroductions.weapon: There exists a universal string that connects different dimensions. This sword is the key that can sever and reconnect this string. It is bestowed upon the dimensional arbitrator sworn to protect the balance of the universe. It can be duplicated indefinitely, but will only grant its powers to the chosen one.
treasures: A magical circle that allows for cross-galactic travel. Nyx's dimensional travel begins and ends with this circle. As the rules of galactic travel and the sequence of light and darkness varies according to the spatiotemporal situations, those who do not possess enough knowledge of dimensions cannot use the circle. Nyx can summon anything using this magical circle.

A legendary sword that has transcended eras. A legendary sword that was made with the light of the sun and the melted souls of those in pain. It is one of the required items for Dimension Cleaver since it is durable enough to withstand dimension and can be made very sharp.

A required item for wizards who go through dimensions. The Dimensional Stone is a magic stone that is loved by those who go through dimensions, and it contains unlimited energy. However, the power that one can use from it depends on the individual's ability. Only high ranking wizards can use it effectively.

A pendant that Nyx used to store the coordinates of numerous magical views he found while traveling the infinite space. The pendant is connected to galaxies in dimension, and the jewel on the pendant changes its color according to the color of the galaxy that is currently connected. One can know the galaxy is gradually moving by looking at the pendant. According to dimensional coordinates, the jewel on the pendant changes its color.
